name: Regional Organisation of the International Trade Union Confederation for Asia and the Pacific
goal: The ITUC Regional Organisation for Asia and Pacific (ITUC Asia Pacific) is a regional organisation of the International Trade Union Confederation representing trade unions from countries in Asia and Oceania.
interests: Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian Aid, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Trade, employment, social policy, environment, competition, external affairs, development, budget
